items.title: RIL's rating could be upgraded over next 12 months, says S&P
items.description: Reliance Jio is expected to benefit from higher tariffs and a growing subscriber base. S&P estimated the unit’s EBITDA will rise 15-17 percent in fiscal 2026.

items.description: Among sectors, except pharma, all other sectoral indices ended in the green with telecom, FMCG, media, auto, oil & gas up 1% each.

items.title: Sensex, Nifty rally for 4th consecutive session as auto, oil & gas stocks surge; small, midcaps outperform

items.title: Small, midcap stocks rally up to 9%, broader markets extend gains for 2nd day; check top gainers
items.description: Nifty Midcap 100 index jumped nearly 1 percent to stand at 57,658, while Nifty Smallcap 100 index rose nearly 0.7 percent to stand at 17,912.35, as seen at 3 pm.

items.title: Nifty Gains On Follow-On Buying But 25,000 Remains Elusive| Closing Bell Live
items.description: Nifty Extends Gains For 4Th Day. Nifty ends near 25,000 on follow-on buying. Broader markets outperform; midcap index up 1%. Autos, Metals, FMCG & IT among gainers. Pharma only sectoral laggard. Catch Nandita Khemka and Yatin Mota as they discuss stocks on their radar.
